entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending early this evening then clearing. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light overnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 24. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 39 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
